price: 14. ¡No es cierto lo que dicen! Realmente, sus corazones están cubiertos por todos los pecados y las malas acciones que realizaron;
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
